rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entry with wheelchair-accessible ramp and automatic door system; minimalist design with open space for immediate impression.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: Connected to the Entrance Hall, featuring a reception area and coat closet with streamlined storage solutions; Vastu alignment considered for auspicious flow.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open plan living space merging dining and lounge areas with minimalistic furniture and ample natural light through large glass windows in accordance to Vastu directions (east-west facing)

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, functional kitchen design incorporating smart appliances; designed for easy wheelchair accessibility with lower counters and accessible cabinets.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A garden courtyard integrated into the ground floor layout to provide natural light, ventilation and adhere to Vastu principles; includes drought-resistant plants and water features for positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible guest bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring, following minimalist design aesthetics and functional layout.

openings.description: Automatic door for easy wheelchair access; designed with energy-efficient glass panels.
Large glazed windows in the living area and kitchen to maximize natural light and ventilation, following Vastu recommendations.
Balcony door from the living area providing access to the rooftop terrace; designed with a gentle ramp for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and en-suite bathroom; designed with Vastu alignment by placing the bed in the south-eastern direction.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible master bathroom featuring grab bars, roll-in shower and a minimalist design; natural light sourced from strategically placed windows.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom designed for family members with a simple layout; ensuring clear space and minimal obstructions per Vastu.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: An adaptable room that can serve as an office or guest bedroom, following minimalist principles and accessible design.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows in each room to provide optimal natural light while respecting privacy.
A gentle staircase with a wheelchair-accessible ramp that leads from the ground floor to first floor, ensuring safe and easy movement.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area on the rooftop terrace designed for wheelchair users; incorporates versatile equipment and ample space for mobility.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive open space offering panoramic views, natural elements, a water feature, and designated seating areas, in line with Vastu principles of relaxation and positive energy.

openings.description: Accessible entry to the rooftop terrace from the living area; includes an accessible ramp in compliance with wheelchair standards.
